description: Set tongues wagging and mouths watering with this spectacular maple-glazed Christmas ham with rosemary. Pair it with roast veggies and vibrant salads.
name: Maple-Glazed Ham With Rosemary Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 kg Woolworths double-smoked half leg ham

recipeInstructions.text: Brush ham with one-third of the glaze. Bake, basting with remaining glaze every 15 minutes, for 1 hour 15 minutes or until ham is golden and caramelised. Transfer to a platter and rest for 30 minutes. Wrap shank in muslin and string, and decorate with extra rosemary sprigs. Serve.

Brush ham with one-third of the glaze. Bake, basting with remaining glaze every 15 minutes, for 1 hour 15 minutes or until ham is golden and caramelised. Transfer to a platter and rest for 30 minutes. Wrap shank in muslin and string, and decorate with extra rosemary sprigs. Serve.
